thread.title: Greek conservative opposition leader Samaras steps down
thread.title_full: Greek conservative opposition leader Samaras steps down

title: Greek conservative opposition leader Samaras steps down
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Mon, Jul 6, 2015, 00:11 BST - UK Markets open in 7 hrs 49 mins Greek conservative opposition leader Samaras steps down Reuters – 18 minutes ago Print 
ATHENS (Reuters) - Former Prime Minister Antonis Samaras announced he was stepping down as leader of Greece's conservative New Democracy opposition party after a strong vote for the 'No' position backed by the leftwing government in Sunday's referendum. 
"Our party needs a new start. As of today, I'm resigning from the leadership of New Democracy," Samaras said in a televised statement. 
(Reporting by Michele Kambas and Karolina Tagaris) Follow the quotes you care about most. Access timely news and investment updates to stay on top of the market. … More » Yahoo UK & Ireland Finance Terms
